goal.ch:
1. Learn to apply theories and knowledge to address problems in Corporate Finance.
2. Develop analytical skills to identify and solve issues related to Financial Management.
3. Learn how to present business cases in an professional way.
goal.en:
1. Learn to apply theories and knowledge to address problems in Corporate Finance.
2. Develop analytical skills to identify and solve issues related to Financial Management.
3. Learn how to present business cases in an professional way.

outline.ch:
1. Topics include investment decisions, corporate financing, capital structure, cash management, payout policy, M&As, and international finance.
2. Classes will be conducted as seminars combined with lectures and case presentations.
3. Theories, concepts, and problem solving skills will be emphasized.
